sentences.sContent: And why should an English speaker be barred from reading blogs written in Malagasy or Zulu?
sentences.sContent_eng: And why should an English speaker be barred from reading blogs written in Malagasy or Zulu?
sentences.sCn: 而且为什么用马达加斯加语或者祖鲁族语写的博客，说英语的人就看不了呢？

sentences.sContent: This Zulu Proverb can be applied to leadership in Africa today.
sentences.sContent_eng: This Zulu Proverb can be applied to leadership in Africa today.
sentences.sCn: 今天，祖鲁族人这句谚语可以应用到非洲的领导身上。

trans.tranOther: someone who belongs to a race of black people who live in South Africa
